name: Khamir

address: At Kukma road to Lakhond Crossroads

briefDescription: Khamir was born out of collaboration between the Nehru Foundation for Development and Abhiyan who promoted it in 2005. The initiative was supported by Government of Gujarat and Confederation of Indian Industries.KHAMIR works to reposition the traditional craft traditions of Kutch to revitalize itâ€™s creative craft tradition. We are a living artisan community dedicated to conserving, developing, and sustaining the rich natural and cultural heritage of the region.Specializing in traditional Kutch block printing, weaving, metal bell making, lacquer, pottery, silver, and leather, KHAMIR is a nonprofit that nurtures craft excellence while cultivating relationships between artisans. KHAMIR works directly with small & medium craft units.
